modals.title: Sign up request submitted
modals.message: Thank you for signing up! Check your email for a confirmation message. If you don't see it, please check your spam folder. Exciting things await — stay tuned!

modals.title: Oops, something went wrong
modals.message: We are sorry, but it seems there was an issue processing your sign-up request. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact our support team at support@nutrideliver.com. We appreciate your patience.
